item.description:
You can exhibit ($119.95 a booth) or visit (FREE!)

Meet experts in all aspects of Home + Health, green living, alternative energy, etc.

Ask the experts your questions, free coffe + tea, free gifts to first 100 visitors. (This is a series of 5 planned thoughout Merrimack Valley and Southern NH till July 16th.)

If you would like to exhibit, the first expo is 1/3 full (as of March 3rd) and we only allow one industry per expo, per city/town.

If your product or service is not directly related to Home or Health it quite often is a hit as people come in to find out what is 'new' out there, and things that can save them money or improve their lifestyle...

You can see past pictures and testimonials and register to exhibit at www.askyourlocalexpert.com.

OK to call me (Greg) at 978-618-9453 with any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Plenty of large outdoor signs with balloons!
item.why: You can exhibit ($119.95 a booth) or visit (FREE!) Meet experts in all aspects of Home + Health, green living, alternative energy, etc. Ask the experts your questions, free coffe + tea, free gifts to first 100 visitors. Five more expos booked already
item.name: Spring Home Show + Health Fair!
